data.title: ER/300 Patients
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

300 Patients is the tenth episode of the fourteenth season of ER, and the three hundredth episode overall.

Starring: Goran Visnjic (Dr. Luka Kovac), Maura Tierney (Dr. Abby Lockhart), Mekhi Phifer (Dr. Gregory Pratt), Parminder Nagra (Dr. Neela Rasgotra), John Stamos (Dr. Tony Gates), Linda Cardellini (Nurse Samantha Taggart), Scott Grimes (Dr. Archie Morris)

Special Guest Stars: Reiko Aylesworth (Julia Dupree), Peter Fonda (Pierce Tanner), Leland Orser (Dr. Lucien Dubenko)

Guest Starring: Steven Christopher Parker (Harold Zelinsky), Laura Cer√≥n (Nurse Chuny Marquez), Troy Evans (Frank Martin), Yvette Freeman (Nurse Haleh Adams), Lily Mariye (Nurse Lily Jarvik), Gil McKinney (Dr. Paul Grady), Montae Russell (Dwight Zadro), April D. Parker (Joyce), Arnell Powell (Del), Desean Terry (Rodney), Nicholas Weiland (Lowell Tanner)

Co-Starring: Tom Astor (Leahy), Dee Dee Davis (Evie), Kiplan Dooley (Van), Elizabeth Graham (Melissa Tanner), Pramod Kumar (Bheru), James Mathers (Security Guard), Ingrid Oliu-Ostrum (Conchita), Lewis Powell (Workman), Zoran Radanovich (Niko), Tony Sancho (Emilio)

Plot Overview

Morris makes a bet with Frank that the ER can set a record of treating 300 patients in one shift; a teenage boy with Down's Syndrome and his mother are involved in a car accident and the boy's estranged father is surprised to find out that his wife has been visiting him; as Abby and Luka prepare to leave for Croatia after the death of Luka's father, Abby confesses to Luka about her alcohol relapse; chaplain Julia decides to hold a blessing ceremony for the ER patients that have passed away.
